question:
You have decided to leave your current employment. Write a letter to your employer. Include the following in your letter:
– Explain why you are writing
– Explain why you have decided to leave the company
– Tell your employer what you plan to do after leaving your present employment
text: I am writing this letter to inform you that I am planing to resign from my current position at KBSL Information Technologies as a Network Engineer on two months form today. Please consider this letter as the two months advanced notice.

It is being really amazing working with you for the fast 2 years. I joined this company as a fresher and leaving as a fully confident Network Engineer thanks to the support of the colleagues of this workplace. I have taken this decision due to my future plans, not because of any dissatisfaction with my current work situation.

As I already informed you that I am planing to migrate in the start of next year. Hence, there are numerous things left to do before I leave, which need time. That is the reason for my early resignation. My plan is to find a employemnt oppertunity in the similar field in Canada as well. Therefore, I have included you as a refree in my resume. I know that you will put a good word for me if you were asked.
